entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sharbot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:28 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:33 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
